source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,396 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 891,632 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.

Valid only for tank specializations.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,890 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 181 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Tabard of the Severed Threads
